comment.author: 21647809@N04
comment._content: By now 1407 was 75 years old, entered service 1865, heavily rebuilt and modified in the 1890s still working in Grenfell (Central Western NSW) in 1940!

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/johncowper] Thanks for the info, I have to confess didn't notice the faded "Grenfell" across the top until you pointed it out!

AB

comment.author: 21647809@N04
comment._content: The old steam locos had remarkable longevity, infrastructure was built to last back then!
